entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
